faqs.q: Why should I study in Australia?
faqs.a: Australia offers world-class education, post-study work rights, and a welcoming environment for international students.

faqs.q: How does Studypath education help with visas?
faqs.a: We provide end-to-end visa consultation for Subclass 500 and other student visa categories, ensuring compliance and faster approvals.

faqs.q: Can I get scholarships for studying in Australia?
faqs.a: Yes, Studypath assists in identifying scholarships based on your academic profile and financial needs.

faqs.q: What are the English test requirements?
faqs.a: Most Australian universities accept IELTS, PTE, or TOEFL. We also offer expert coaching to help you meet these requirements.

faqs.q: Does Studypath help after I reach Australia?
faqs.a: Absolutely. We offer post-arrival support for accommodation, settling in, and connecting you with local student communities.
